Text: Do you happen to have any of the Modern Masters series from TwoMorrows publishing? There are perhaps 2 dozen of them out, and hard as hell to find.
Thank you LeonardTSpock for all your fantastic underground comics uploads.  Could you please upload next restored versions of all the underground and independent horror comics.  Thank you.

jessfranc, you're most welcome. No Underground stuff in the round I just upped, but there will be plenty of it in the future. 

STFmaryville, I uploaded all of them that I have at the moment.
